name: My Battle
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 45, theme "You start with nothing" or something like that...

This is a game about facing down your own demons and choosing to fight every day even if it seems to be impossible.

WASD or Arrow keys move

L Jumps
K Attacks

Down and Jump slides when upgraded

Pressing the mouse skips the transition scenes

Music - @JamesOliverMusic (https://soundcloud.com/jamesolivermusicuk)

Art and Coding - Minibobbo
